title: Featured Game Spectate
body:
Jesus, here we are again. 

It's just SO exhausting having to go through this all the time. 
Why do we have to get rid of it, that nice little box giving me a selection of games to choose from to spectate?

Couldn't we just NOT get rid of it?
Hell, I'm perfectly happy to meet half way and just have an option to x off the ad and bring it back, like it was in the old client. 

But that's too much to ask, I guess. 

Having to go in to my profile, go to leagues, view challenger tier, view solo queue challenger, then scroll to find someone in a match is pretty unnecessarily tedious, then on top of that for it to be the same a-holes I've spectated for like 3 days straight...

Please, just bring Featured Games back. And stop taking it away. Please.

replies.body: I also miss the spectate mode.

And look, a day later and it's STILL the same. Good times. 

Sigh, really exhausting.

I agree with this man! Though this isn't a full fix you can download baron replay, it seems like the code is still there just hidden and baron replay can see it. 

I could be wrong but it had the option when I was using baron replay.
Might have a look into that, thanks for the suggestion. Anything to make it a modicum easier.
